scripts.build-rds-lambda: cd rds-lambda && mkdir -p node_modules && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && tsc && cp -r node_modules lib && cd lib && bestzip --force node ../../lib/rds-lambda.zip ./* && cd ../..
scripts.build-rds-patching-lambda: cd rds-patching-lambda && mkdir -p node_modules && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && tsc && cp -r node_modules lib && cd lib && bestzip --force node ../../lib/rds-patching-lambda.zip ./* && cd ../..
scripts.build-notification-lambda: cd publish-notification-lambda && mkdir -p node_modules && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && tsc && cp -r node_modules lib && cd lib && bestzip --force node ../../lib/rds-notification-lambda.zip ./* && cd ../..
scripts.build: tsc && yarn build-rds-lambda && yarn build-rds-patching-lambda && yarn build-notification-lambda
